name: Seasick (SukkoyF)
description:
This is a prototype version, expect bugs and flaws but do use the in game report feature if you encounter any or have any suggestions.  If you enjoy this project you can follow it's development on Twitch as I stream daily! Synopsis :

Seasick is a casual strategy game in which you play as an  aquatic environment. You will take the role of fish, crabs, planktons,etc... and will be tasked to face an undefeatable enemy : climate change and pollution. Your objective is to evolve and protect your ecosystem.

Current Features :
  • 9 Playable units - Each with different stats and abilities.
  • 3 Different Trash enemies
  • Basic Tutorial 
  • Evolution points - Collect them to get access to various upgrades to  keep your ecosystem alive.
  • Sea warming - As the heat rises, your units may overheat and cause them to lose health.
  • Sea acidification - As the ph gets lower, some of your unist will be affected and will be slowed down, being able to only play once every 2 turns.
